content.raw:
So this might have been brought up before, but as far as I know, both ODE and Bullet define planes as having infinite sizes and I think DART's PlaneShape does the same.  In Gazebo9 and earlier, the size tag in the SDF spec was used for specifying the size of the plane for visualization only. My thought was to keep that same interpretation of what a plane is and live with an arbitrarily large box for now. 

I've been meaning to update the documentation in the SDF spec to convey that the size tag is not taken into account for collisions. I'll put it on my todo list.
